Work Experience.title: AVP, Client Strategy and Analytics
Work Experience.description: Leveraged web scraping and RAG frameworks alongside Generative AI for fintech wallet potential estimation. Modeled banker-client revenue relations using machine learning. Applied NLP for client feedback analysis to drive client experience optimization and revenue correlation. Developed client segmentation and cross-sell revenue frameworks using K-Means clustering and XGBoost regression. Discovered ~3x episodic derivative revenue increase by analyzing banker behaviors during calls and meetings.

Work Experience.title: Decision Analytics Associate Consultant (Customer Centric Marketing Strategy)
Work Experience.description: Developed advanced predictive models for customer engagement, including CNNs and Genetic Algorithms implementations leading to 10-15% revenue uplift. Built response models for promotional channel impact quantification, improving targeting and ROI. Led marketing budget optimization via Marketing Mix Modeling (MMM). Engineered hybrid recommender system combining collaborative filtering and channel affinity modeling.

Projects.title: Design and Implementation of Patient Care Giving System using P300 based Brain Computer Interface
Projects.description: Engineered machine learning algorithms (ANN, KNN, SVM) to detect and interpret EEG signal components for enhancing patient care and real-time monitoring.

Projects.title: Omni Channel Promotion Modelling
Projects.description: Developed omni channel promotion models using Deep Learning (CNN) and Genetic Algorithms to optimize promotional strategies and maximize revenue.

Other relevant info.Target Objective: Leverage expertise in Data Science for machine learning, deep learning, advanced analytics, and strategic client engagement to enhance business success.
